nodes.bodyText: If this method is intended to improve readability or for some other reason it is certainly fine, but we should avoid hiding the tabs field with a local variable named tabs.

We want to use the term Result in place of Artifact in text the end user will read.
Also we may want to consider the following phrasing instead for consistency with the rest of the application.
"View Source Result" and
"View Source File in Directory"
